channel.title: Dwarves Memo on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Dwarves Memo on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: How to set up environment to edit memo
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Before you enter the tutorial, please generate your SSH key by following this instruction. The process includes 3 steps: Create ssh key pair (public, private) Save private key to your computer Submit public key to github A.

item.title: How to push content on note.d.foundation
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Set up Our note.d.foundation site runs with submodules and is pulled through HTTPS as opposed to SSH, for security and easy onboarding.

item.title: $icy Salary Advance
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: As we said in our recent post $icy in 2024 plan. Today, we’re launching the first feature from our 2024 roadmap: an $icy salary advance.

item.title: From Data To Backend An Apprentice Sharing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: For My Anh*, Dwarves Foundation Apprenticeship has surpassed a traditional training program concept. With her, it’s been a huge shift: A supportive team that embraces her for who she is and unlocks her capabilities to grow in ways she never imagined.

item.title: Getting Started With Webflow
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: No-code platform has becoming a thing recently. With convenient and user-friendly workflow, no-code platform is a must to pick up for design and operation process, to shorten the development time and remove the misunderstanding between them with developers.
